Florida Memorial is a school of excellence. This school provided me with an opportunity to proceed and succeed in life. Rating Florida Memorial 1- 10, 10 being the highest on the lowest, i give them a 10.

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students a heads up about this university would be that the food is not that appealing and females dress like the are in a fashion show every day. Oh and be prepared to dress professionally every Wednesday. Am enjoying being here besides the parties, i love my roomates, and the many activities that take place on compus its loads of fun Am learning a lot The professors at this university are loads of fun and make learning a pleasure, small class ensure one on one time with your instructor allowing a better understanding of the material.
